hero.title: Hello, I'm Rômulo Oliveira
hero.text: +3 years of experience. Software Developer from Fortaleza, Brazil. Specialized in web technology development.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Development and maintenance of a driver's license registration and management system for the German government. Actively contributed to the design, development, and continuous refinement of innovative solutions for the project. My tasks also include code reviews, testing, and creating detailed documentation to ensure quality and usability.

projects.title: Agenda Fácil - Digital scheduling for small and medium businesses
projects.description: Agenda Fácil is a scheduling system for small and medium businesses. With it, you can manage schedules, services, and clients in a simple and efficient way.

about.title: Sobre
about.text_01: My name is Rômulo Oliveira and I started my programming career in 2021. Currently, I work as a freelance software developer with a focus on business solutions.
about.text_02: I am responsible for the development of Agenda Fácil, a service scheduling system for businesses in any industry.
about.text_03: In addition, I am always seeking new challenges and opportunities to apply my knowledge and develop my skills as a programmer.
